| HistoryText             = In an attempt to conquer Earth, [[Franklin Hall (Earth-616)|Graviton]] gathered Quantum, Zzzax and Halflife from different planets.

The three villains went on a rampage that attracted the West Coast Avengers ([[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Hawkeye]], [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Mockingbird]], [[Simon Williams (Earth-616)|Wonder Man]], [[Greer Nelson (Earth-616)|Tigra]] and [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]]). The Avengers were eventually defeated by the combined force of Trouble and Graviton, though Zzzax had been dispersed and lost.

After that Graviton moved on with his plan but without knowing that Tigra had infiltrated in his base under her secret identity. Disguised as one of the guards, Tigra led Halflife to believe that Quantum wanted to kill her, and vice versa. This caused the two to begin to fight unleashing great amounts of power until Graviton set the two apart, causing a bigger explosion, destroying Graviton's base and his plans.

After this defeat, Trouble disbanded.{{r|West Coast Avengers Vol 2 12|13}}
